data.title: Lydia Shum – JayneStars.com
data.text:
Joyce Cheng’s 2-month Disappearance from Work

Was the 36-year-old singer's absence from work due to boyfriend troubles?

Next Year, Joyce Cheng Can Freely Spend HK$60 Million Inheritance

Her mother, Lydia Shum, made Joyce wait until she is 35 years old before she can spend it freely.

Steps Joyce Cheng is Taking to Improve Her Mental Health

When Joyce was only 1 year old, her parents Lydia Shum and Adam Cheng divorced, causing Joyce to have a negative lifelong outlook on love.

Joyce Cheng Gets Emotional on Anniversary of Mother’s Passing

Joyce imagines what it would be like if her late mother, Lydia Shum, were still alive.

Joyce Cheng Misses Late Mother, Lydia Shum, Every Day

Yesterday was Lydia Shum's 11th death anniversary, which made Joyce Cheng reflect on her mother.

Joyce Cheng Spent Lunar New Year Watching Her Mother’s Films

Joyce Cheng misses her mother on Lunar New Year.

Joyce Cheng Prepares for Mother Lydia Shum’s Memorial Concert

Joyce Cheng will be performing in a concert commemorating her mother Lydia Shum's 5-year death anniversary on June 1.

Stars Gather for Lydia Shum’s Memorial Concert in June

Jacky Cheung, Liza Wang, Carol Cheng, and more Hong Kong celebrities will gather for Lydia Shum's 5-year death anniversary commemorative concert.
